body_html: @soumith It's more work to insert and test that the extern 'C' declarations are working, and my understanding is that the work coming down the pipe (in particular, abolishing THTensor and storing these fields directly in C++ objects) means that the FFI interface will stop working anyway. So I'm skipping a bit of extra work that would become moot shortly.
